i.name: File name must end with alphanumberic character
i.value: File name must end with alphanumberic character

i.name: mV.hf
i.description: Parses given string as Shell command.

i.name: kD.M
i.description: Sets time difference in seconds from real time.

i.name: ld.hJ
i.description: Sets folder icon color desktop. (list colors '-il')

i.name: jq.jH
i.description: Sets / gets background of given workspace.

i.name: nN.md
i.description: Checks if item exists in filesystem.

i.name: lK
i.description: Returns list of all files of kind in folder.

i.name: nD
i.description: Syncs files to server, if any in offline cache.

i.name: iH
i.description: Returns a preview of file, if small.
